members.joinCircumstances: Founded the Neo Marines after leaving the regular Marines
Followed Z from the Marines to the Neo Marines
Former Marine Commodore who defected with Z
members.leaveCircumstances: Defeated by Luffy and captured by Marines, sent to Impel Down

keyMoments.title: Neo Marines Launch Suicide Torpedo Attack
keyMoments.description: Shuzo's Neo Marine subordinates sacrifice themselves as human torpedoes in a desperate attack on the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the fanatical devotion and extremist methods of the Neo Marines.

keyMoments.title: Shuzo Captured by Marines
keyMoments.description: One of the Neo Marines' top commanders is defeated and imprisoned, representing a significant loss for the organization.
keyMoments.significance: Weakens the Neo Marines but doesn't stop their overall plan.

keyMoments.title: Neo Marines Continue New World Plan
keyMoments.description: Despite Shuzo's defeat, Z declares that the Neo Marines will proceed with their plan to eliminate all pirates from the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the events of One Piece Film Z and shows the organization's unwavering determination.

jollyRoger.description: Unknown - Neo Marines use military insignia rather than a traditional jolly roger

goals.goal: Eliminate all pirates from the New World

ideology: Extremist justice - believes all pirates must be eliminated, even if it means using ruthless methods and sacrificing their own members
